from itertools import izip

def main():
 result=[]
 def testcases(number):
   global num
   global weigh
   global rack
   num=input()
   weigh = map(int, raw_input().split())
   
   rack = map(int, raw_input().split())
   Max()
   number=number-1
   if (number>0):
     testcases(number)
  
 def Max():
  
   weigh.sort()
   rack.sort()
   maxi=0
   end=num
   start=0
   for x in xrange(0,num):
      temp=0
      
    
     
      for (a,c) in izip(xrange(0,end),xrange(start,num)):
        
        if weigh[a]<=rack[c]:
           temp=temp+1
          
      if temp>maxi:
         maxi=temp
      
      end=end-1
      start=start+1
      
   
     
   result.append(maxi)
 nu=input()
 testcases(nu)
 for re in result:
  print re
   
   
   
if __name__=='__main__':
  main()
